text: Mukhtar Hussain (born 11 January 1999) is an Indian cricketer. He made his List A debut for Assam in the 2017–18 Vijay Hazare Trophy on 13 February 2018. He made his first-class debut for Assam in the 2018–19 Ranji Trophy on 1 November 2018. He was the leading wicket-taker for Assam in the tournament, with 40 dismissals in nine matches. He made his Twenty20 debut for Assam in the 2018–19 Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy on 21 February 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Indian cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Assam cricketers
title: Mukhtar Hussain
